tool.name: MFAssignR RecalList
tool.description: Identification of candidate series for recalibration.

configfiles.configfile:
df <- read.delim("$input_file", sep="\t") recal <- MFAssignR::RecalList( df = df )
write.table(recal, file = '$recal_series', row.names= FALSE, sep = "\t")

param.name: input_file
param.label: Input data
param.help: Input data frame - output from MFAssign or MFAssignCHO. Recommended are 'Unambiguous' assignments.

tool.help: RecalList() function identifies the homologous series that could be used for recalibration. On the input, there is the output from MFAssign() or MFAssignCHO() functions. It returns a dataframe that contains the CH2 homologous series that contain more than 3 members.
